attributes.action: Safeguard skyscraper development plans in central London
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We urge the Prime Minister to listen to all sides in the development of new skyscrapers in the central London area given recent opposition by organisations like English Heritage and UNESCO who are opposed ideologically to the further architectural development of one the world's most dynamic financial zones. Due prominence must be shown to both developers, interested clients and skyscraper enthusiasts committed to making London the envy of the developed world.
